# toPhylo.py

Work with python tree.

```{python}
from ete3 import Tree
tree = Tree()
# We create a random tree topology
tree.populate(5)
# or build from a newick style
tree = Tree('((A:1,(B:1,C:1)1:1)1:1,(D:1,E:1):1);')

print(tree)
```
